name: exlimdh
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w1), w2))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w2)
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w1), w2))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w2)
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

|- wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w1), w2))
-| wnf(s0, w2)
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))

|- wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w2, wal(s0, w2))

comment: Deduction form of Theorem 19.9 of [Margaris] p. 89. (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-1997.)
